field.name: summary
field.value: when i rebuild my project, the "ASP.NET Development Server" crash

field.name: description
field.value: I used MicroKernel-Windsor in my project, but when i rebuild my project, the "ASP.NET Development Server" is crash. why?

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: Shawer, please post your issue on the Castle users mailing list, so that we have a chance to determine if this is a Castle bug. Are you able to isolate it to a simple web application project we can look at?

comment.author: jonorossi
comment.text: Not that I recall, I think we should just close this issue as invalid.

comment.author: Shawer
comment.text: Sorry, I haven't receive email notice at the last time, thanks for reply and close the issue please. It's not a issue.

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Cannot Reproduce''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
